name: Star Gulf
description:
A calm, casual game about "golfing" stars. Light up the empty night sky, then connect them to make your own constellations!

Features:

  • Take the time to relax as you fill your canvas with shining stars
  • Connect the dots to make full 3D constellations
  • Save up to 3 of your favorite creations

Controls

  • Star Shot Mode
    • Q - Meteor shower/clear the board
    • R - Ready a star
    • WASD - Aim the star
    • Hold Space (when star is ready) - Charge star power
      • Release Space - Launch star
    • E - Switch to Constellation Mode
  • Constellation Mode
    • Click one star then another to make a constellation line between them
    • A and D - Rotate constellation right and left
    • E - Switch to Star Shot Mode
